Text: Once upon a time... ...there was an old-fashioned kingdom bound by tradition. Here, everyone had a part to play, and they played it without question. Little did they know, their world was about to change. But until it did, y'all... This village of hardworking citizens moved to the same beat day after day, generation after generation. And over here is where our story begins, at the humble home of a practical woman named Vivian, who was alone again after the death of her second husband. Vivian's daughters: the obnoxious Malvolia and the self-absorbed Narissa. She cray. Um, yeah. They can be a lot. I'm winning! Whee! And down here, in this dingy basement, the stepdaughter, Ella. Or, as her stepsisters call her, Cinderella, because her skin was often besmirched by cinders and her stepsisters were not that clever. Right now, she's dreaming of a world in which she can live her life any way she wants. Uh, watch it now. You about to roll over on that...
